articles.title: No medical help, hurt during landing, says techie who was trapped in Mumbai-Bengaluru Spicejet flight loo - Times of India
articles.description: A 37-year-old software professional shares his traumatic experience of being stuck inside the toilet of a SpiceJet flight without any medical assistance. Read more about the incident and the passenger's plans to take legal action against the airline.

articles.title: 71% rich Indians wish to invest in luxury real estate in the next 2 years - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Capital appreciation overtakes the primary reason to buy real estate, compared to lifestyle upgrade last year.
articles.content: As many as 71% rich Indians want to invest in real estate in the next 12-24 months, indicating that there is significant confidence in the property market. Capital appreciation has overtaken lifestyl… [+3634 chars]

articles.title: Asian Paints CEO says doubtful if competition could even get ₹5,000 crore sales in three years - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Asian Paints MD & CEO mentioned that volume growth for December stood between 8% and 9%, adding that he is confident of double-digit volume growth for the company in the March quarter as well.
